metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1945 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The nsZipArchive function in Mozilla Firefox before 44.0 might allow remoteattackers to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified otherimpact by leveraging incorrect use of a pointer during processing of a ZIParchive.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 44.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 44.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 44.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 44.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '44.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
